courseDetails.title: CSS And JavaScript Complete Course For Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Complete CSS And JavaScript Programming Language In-depth With CSS And JavaScript Complete Course For Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn CSS And Javascript Complete Course For Beginners

Section 1- CSS Course with basics and advanced concepts of CSS

  • Ever wonder how the latest website designs are made? Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) are the main coding files used to layout a website and its design. CSS 3 is the latest in styling standards, and it brings several new properties and declarations you can use to make your website design more easily created. CSS is currently the only standard in website design that plugs directly into your HTML, even the latest HTML 5 standards. With CSS 3 and HTML 5, you can create the latest interactive pages for your website viewers.

  • This course shows you how to create CSS classes from a beginner's level. It starts off with basic HTML declarations, properties, values, and how to include a CSS style sheet with your HTML code. For those of you who are new to CSS and HTML, we show you step-by-step how to create a CSS file and include it in your HTML code, even if you use a cloud server for your hosting.

  • We show you how to position your elements, layout your elements relative to your documents, and style your HTML using predefined CSS values. We introduce you to the common CSS styling that you'll need when you start off designing your pages. If you want to get to know CSS and website design, this course is meant for you, and it can be used by anyone who hasn't even seen one line of CSS code yet. We focus on the latest CSS 3 and HTML 5 standards, so you get the latest when coding your website pages instead of focusing on older code.

  • There are no prerequisites. Anyone Can join this course. It is recommended though that individual have some basic computer programming knowledge.


  • Course Topics


  • Introduction to CSS

  • Inclusion Of CSS In HTML

  • CSS Syntax

  • CSS Styling Text

  • CSS Page Backgrounds

  • CSS 2D Transform

  • CSS 3D Transform

  • CSS Animation

    And More....


    Section 2- Learn Javascript Programming Language

    • The course is created with thorough, extensive, but easy-to-follow content that you’ll easily understand and absorb.

      The course starts with the basics, including JavaScript fundamentals, programming, and user interaction.


      The curriculum is going to be very hands-on as we walk you from start to finish to become a professional Javascript developer. We will start from the very beginning by teaching you Javascript basics and programming fundamentals, and then execute into real-life practice and be ready for the real world.


    • While Javascript is complicated for beginners to learn, it is widely used in many web development areas.

    • This course gets you started with an introduction to JavaScript. It assumes that you're new to the language, so it gets you started with basic functionality such as creating functions, creating variables, and calling these lines of code from your standard HTML pages. It talks about events and triggers for custom event handling. It talks about pattern matching, searching for text within a page, flow control, and the document object model (DOM). We start off with the basics and move on to more complex functionality such as arrays and objects. We then discuss how to script common elements with JavaScript such as forms and tables. At the very end, we discuss major libraries such as Ajax, which allows you to make asynchronous calls to server-side scripts without reloading the web page in the server.

    • Master the fundamentals of writing Javascript scripts

    • Learn core Javascript scripting elements such as variables and Objects

    • Discover how to work with lists and sequence data

    • Write Javascript functions to facilitate code reuse

    • Use Javascript to read and write files

    • Make their code robust by handling errors and exceptions properly

    • Search text using regular expressions

    • The topics covered in this course are:

      * Javascript Course Contents:

    • Javascript Introduction

    • Javascript Array

    • Javascript Variables

    • Javascript Functions

    • Javascript Objects

    • Javascript Control Statements

    • Javascript Cookies

    • Javascript Loop statements

    • Javascript Data Structures

    • Javascript Error Handling

    • Javascript Regular Expressions

    • See you inside the course

  • Thank you see you inside the course
targetAudiences: For People New to CSS And JavaScript
For People Who want to learn CSS And JavaScript Fundamentals and later Transition into Web Designing
For People New to Web Designing

courseDetails.title: ١٩ - ٢٠ - تحقیق النمو والتوسع في الأسواق العالمیة
courseDetails.shortDescription: النمو ليس خيارًا، بل ضرورة حتمية لاستمرار ونجاح أي شركة
courseDetails.longDescription:
الشركة التي لا تنمو، لا تقف في مكانها، بل تبدأ بالتراجع فورًا. لا وجود لحالة "الجمود" في عالم الأعمال؛ إما أن تنمو وتتقدم، أو أن يسبقك الآخرون

ويأخذوا مكانك في السوق.

إذا كنت اليوم في المرتبة الأولى في السوق، واستمرت أرقامك كما هي في العام التالي دون أي تحسُّن أو نمو، فمن المؤكد أن منافسًا آخر سيتجاوزك، وستتراجع إلى المرتبة الثانية أو الثالثة.

انظر إلى الشركات العملاقة مثل: سامسونج، تويوتا، جنرال إلكتريك، أمازون، آبل، وول مارت وغيرها.
قارن بين مبيعاتها اليوم ومبيعاتها قبل عشر سنوات – أو حتى العام الماضي فقط – وستكتشف أن النمو المستمر هو عنصر أساسي ليس فقط لتعزيز الريادة، بل لضمان البقاء والاستمرارية.


النمو يعني التغيير، وكل الاستراتيجيات التسويقية والإدارية، سواء التي نناقشها في هذا الكورس أو تلك التي ستتطور في المستقبل، تدور جميعها حول محور واحد: التغيير.

تغيير في المنتجات.
تغيير في الأسواق.
تغيير في سلوك العملاء.
بل وحتى تغيير في العملاء أنفسهم، والموارد البشرية، وسلاسل التوريد.

التطور هو نتيجة طبيعية للتغيير، أما الثبات في عالم الأعمال فهو بداية التراجع الحتمي.

التوسع إلى الأسواق العالمية والتصدير يُعد حلمًا مشروعًا وطموحًا لأي شركة ناجحة.
هذا الحلم يُعد معيارًا قويًا وواضحًا لقياس النجاح المؤسسي، وتحقيقه يفتح أمام الشركة:

· أسواقًا جديدة.

· مصادر دخل إضافية.

· عوائد بالعملة الصعبة.

· علاقات وشراكات دولية.

· وتعزيزًا كبيرًا لقيمة العلامة التجارية.

كما يُساهم هذا التوسع في تنويع المخاطر وتقليل الاعتماد على سوق واحد، مما يزيد من مرونة الشركة وقدرتها على مواجهة التقلّبات الاقتصادية أو السياسية في أي بلد بعينه.

ومع ذلك، فكما أن لهذا التوسع مزايا عظيمة، إلا أن تحقيقه بنجاح ليس بالأمر السهل.
فالشركة التي تسعى إلى الانتقال من المحلية إلى العالمية تحتاج إلى:

· رؤية اقتصادية شاملة.

· فهم عميق لتحديات الأسواق الدولية والمنافسة الخارجية.

· قدرة دقيقة على إدارة المخاطر والاستعداد لها.

باختصار:
النمو هو روح الأعمال، والتغيير هو وسيلته، والرؤية العالمية هي مستقبله.
ومن لا يواكب، يتأخر.
ومن لا يتغير، يندثر.


هذه هي الدورات رقم (١٩ – ٢٠) من أصل 20 دورة في دبلومة "التسويق الشامل" يمكنك الإشتراك في هذا الكورس أو الإستفادة بسعر مخفض على الدبلومة المتكاملة (٢٠ كورس) بسعر مخفض جداً


محتويات الكورس رقم ١٩ (الأول من هذه المجموعة):



  1. Assessing Growth Opportunities أو تقييم فرص النمو

  2. Growth Dynamics/Strategies محركات واستراتيجيات النمو

  3. Gaining Market Position اكتساب التمركز في السوق

  4. Defending Market Position الدفاع عن تمركز السوق


محتويات الكورس رقم ٢٠ (الثاني من هذه المجموعة):


  1. Competing on a Global Basis التنافس على مستوى عالمي

  2. Deciding Whether to Go Abroad القرار بخصوص التواجد الخارجي

  3. Deciding Which Markets to Enter اختيار الأسواق المناسبة

  4. Deciding How to Enter the Market تحديد كيفية دخول السوق الخارجي

  5. Deciding on the Global Marketing Program أو تحديد برامج التسويق الدولي

  6. Ethical Marketing التسويق الأخلاقي
targetAudiences: كل طلبة التسويق اللي محتاجين منهج شامل ومفصل مدعوم بالخبرة العملية ... كل العاملين في مجال التسويق .. كل أصحاب الشركات ورواد الأعمال وأصحاب المشاريع ... كل اللي مهتم بالمبيعات ... وكل اللي مهتم إنه يغير مساره الوظيفي.

courseDetails.title: Ultimate Job Seeker Course - Resume, Cover Letter, Interview
courseDetails.shortDescription: From Job Seeker to Job Winner: A Step-by-Step Guide to Resume, Cover Letter, and Interview Success
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to land the job you’ve always wanted? The Ultimate Job Seeker Course is your complete guide to mastering every aspect of the job application process, from crafting the perfect resume and cover letter to acing interviews with confidence. Whether you’re a recent graduate, a career changer, or looking to level up your job-hunting skills, this course will equip you with the tools, techniques, and strategies you need to stand out in today’s competitive job market.

What You’ll Learn:

  • Build a Winning Resume: Learn to create a tailored, professional resume that highlights your strengths and gets you noticed by employers.

  • Write Impactful Cover Letters: Discover how to write persuasive cover letters that showcase your personality and make you the ideal candidate for the role.

  • Ace Your Interviews: Master proven interview techniques, from answering common questions to navigating tough scenarios, so you can walk into any interview with confidence.

  • Insider Tips & Tricks: Get insights from hiring managers and recruiters to understand what they’re really looking for in candidates.

Why Choose This Course?

  • Step-by-step Guidance: We break down each part of the job application process, so you can follow along at your own pace.

  • Downloadable Templates: Access ready-to-use resume and cover letter templates that you can customize to fit your unique skills and experiences.

  • Practical Exercises: Practice what you learn with exercises that simulate real-world scenarios, from drafting your resume to mock interview sessions.

  • Lifetime Access: Revisit the course anytime you need a refresher or as you move through different stages of your career.

Take Charge of Your Career Path!

Don’t let job hunting be a stressful experience. With the Ultimate Job Seeker Course, you’ll have everything you need to approach your job search with confidence, knowing that you have the skills to stand out and succeed. Enroll today and take the first step toward landing your dream job!
targetAudiences: Individuals seeking to advance their careers or find new opportunities.

courseDetails.title: Canva Mastery: Design Like a Pro in Just Days
courseDetails.shortDescription: Canva for Productivity: Design Faster & Smarter with Time-Saving Techniques
courseDetails.longDescription:
Take your design skills from zero to hero in this action-packed course and conquer Canva like a pro!

Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to refine your skills, this course is your ultimate guide to mastering Canva. In just a few days, you'll transform from a Canva novice to a design powerhouse, creating professional-looking visuals for any project.

Here's what you'll get:

  • Solid foundation: Grasp the core functionalities of Canva and navigate the interface with ease.

  • Design essentials: Master the principles of design, typography, and color theory to create visually impactful pieces.

  • Canva pro tips and tricks: Unlock the hidden gems of Canva and utilize powerful features to streamline your workflow.

  • Project-based learning: Put your newfound skills to the test by creating real-world designs, from social media graphics to presentations.

  • Learn from the best: Benefit from expert instruction and gain valuable insights to fast-track your design journey.

  • Time-saving techniques: Discover efficient workflows and hacks to create stunning visuals in record time.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Design eye-catching graphics for social media, presentations, marketing materials, and more.

  • Build a cohesive brand identity using Canva's design tools and templates.

  • Utilize Canva's advanced features with confidence, including animations and effects.

  • Stand out from the crowd with professional and polished designs.

This course is perfect for:

  • Entrepreneurs and small business owners

  • Social media managers and marketers

  • Educators and students

  • Content creators and bloggers

  • Anyone who wants to create impactful visuals without design experience

Enroll now and unlock your design potential with Canva!
targetAudiences: Entrepreneurs and small business owners
Social media managers and marketers
Educators and students
Content creators and bloggers

courseDetails.title: Learn Filmora Video Editing Masterclass From Beginner to Pro
courseDetails.shortDescription: Filmora Editing for Beginners: Master the Basics and Become a Pro Video Creator
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unleash your creativity and transform your video ideas into stunning films with this comprehensive Filmora video editing masterclass!

Whether you're a complete beginner with no prior experience or looking to take your editing skills to the next level, this course is your one-stop shop to mastering Filmora.

In this beginner-friendly course, you'll embark on a step-by-step journey, learning everything you need to know to edit captivating videos:

  • Master the Filmora Interface: Navigate the workspace with ease and understand all the essential tools.

  • Import & Organize Footage: Learn to import clips from various sources and organize them efficiently for a smooth editing workflow.

  • Editing Fundamentals: Become a pro at cutting, trimming, and arranging your clips to create a compelling narrative.

  • Advanced Techniques: Explore transitions, effects, titles, and audio manipulation to add polish and professionalism to your videos.

  • Color Correction & Grading: Enhance the visual appeal of your videos with color correction and grading techniques.

  • Export & Sharing: Learn how to export your finished videos in different formats for various platforms (YouTube, social media, etc.).

By the end of this course, you'll be confident in your ability to edit professional-looking videos with Filmora and take your storytelling to the next level.

This course is perfect for:

  • Beginners with no prior editing experience

  • Content creators for YouTube, social media, or personal projects

  • Entrepreneurs and businesses looking to create engaging video content

  • Anyone who wants to learn the power of video editing and tell their stories with Filmora

Don't wait! Enroll today and start creating stunning videos that captivate your audience!
targetAudiences: Content creators producing videos for YouTube, social media, or personal projects
Entrepreneurs and business owners aiming to make captivating video content
Anyone interested in mastering video editing to tell stories with Filmora

courseDetails.title: Advanced Capcut: From Beginner to Motion Graphics Master
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Capcut Editing: From Beginner to Motion Graphics Master for Social Media Domination
courseDetails.longDescription:
Captivate Your Audience: Advanced Capcut Editing From Beginner to Motion Graphics Master

Are you ready to take your Capcut video editing skills to the next level? This comprehensive course is designed to transform you from a beginner Capcut user into a motion graphics master.

What you'll learn:

  • Solid foundation: Master the core editing techniques in Capcut, ensuring smooth transitions and polished edits.

  • Motion graphics mastery: Unlock the power of keyframe animation, masking, and text effects to create stunning motion graphics within Capcut.

  • Pro editing workflows: Learn efficient editing practices to streamline your workflow and save time.

  • Engagement strategies: Discover how to leverage motion graphics to grab attention and create captivating videos for social media, YouTube, or presentations.

This course is perfect for:

  • Anyone who wants to learn advanced Capcut editing techniques to create impactful and engaging video content.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Confidently edit videos in Capcut using advanced techniques.

  • Create high-quality motion graphics to enhance your video storytelling.

  • Export and share your polished videos across various platforms.

So if you want to level up yourself and become a master in video editing than Enroll now and unleash the full potential of Capcut to create stunning and engaging videos that will leave your audience in awe!
targetAudiences: Anyone who want to learn advanced capcut video editing

courseDetails.title: The Complete Social Media Video Editing Masterclass
courseDetails.shortDescription: Social Media Video Edit With Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effect, Canva, Capcut
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dominate Social Media: Video Editing Masterclass with Premiere Pro, After Effects, Canva & CapCut

Stop Scrolling, Start Creating!

This action-packed course equips you to become a social media video editing pro. We'll explore a powerhouse combo: industry-standard Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects for advanced editing and motion graphics, alongside the user-friendly Canva and mobile app CapCut for quick edits and on-the-go creation.

No Experience Needed!

Whether you're a complete beginner or have some editing experience, this course is designed for you. We'll break down each platform step-by-step, so you'll be editing like a pro in no time.

Here's What You'll Master:

  • Adobe Premiere Pro: Conquer the fundamentals of video editing, from cutting clips and adding transitions to color correction and audio mixing.

  • After Effects Essentials: Breathe life into your videos with captivating motion graphics, text animations, and special effects.

  • Canva for Visuals: Design stunning social media graphics, intros, and outros with ease using Canva's intuitive interface.

  • CapCut on the Go: Learn to edit captivating videos for Instagram Reels, TikTok, and other platforms directly from your mobile device.

Go Beyond the Basics:

This course doesn't just teach you the tools; it teaches you how to use them effectively. You'll learn:

  • Social Media Storytelling: Craft engaging narratives that grab attention and keep viewers hooked.

  • Platform Optimization: Tailor your video content for specific social media platforms to maximize reach and engagement.

  • Trending Video Styles: Learn the latest editing techniques and effects used by top creators to make your videos stand out.

Project-Based Learning:

Sharpen your skills with real-world projects like creating a social media ad, a product explainer video, and a stunning Instagram Reel.

By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Edit professional-quality social media videos from start to finish.

  • Add captivating motion graphics and special effects using After Effects.

  • Design stunning visuals for your videos with Canva.

  • Create engaging content on-the-go with CapCut.

  • Stand out on social media with unique and effective video content.

This course is perfect for:

  • Anyone who wants to create captivating videos for social media

Enroll today and become a social media video editing master!
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn in-demand video editing skills
